title: WATCH: Mauricio Pochettino says his wife is his biggest critic
description: Watch and listen to Mauricio Pochettino explain how his wife is his biggest critic.
content: According to the Tottenham manager, she provides constructive criticism of each and every press conference he gives.The Argentinian says she corrects his language and grammar, while putting him straight on a number of issues.On Sunday, Pochettino takes his Tottenham players to Anfield for a vital match between teams currently ranked third and fifth in the Premier League table.A win for Spurs would certainly move them into the Champions League positions and, depending on how Chelsea perform, they could even be third at midnight on Monday.Watch Liverpool v Tottenham live on Sky Sports this Sunday
